Hi, the bug is very simple. I made a multi-launch space station in low kerbin orbit and the next day when I came back the station was deorbitting itself but with a vertical course directly onto the ground.

- KSP V 1.2.0

- Win11 I7-8700 | RTX2060

- Step to replicate ??? I presume nothing in particular

- No mods

Same here. For me it appears after loading a game for sure, but cannot roll-out changing ship. Once it actually happen after separation and changing a ship.
The bug seems not modify the size of orbiting circle, but just misplaced it, so it start colliding with Kerbin. 

KSP 1.2.0 (vanila)
WIN10 | Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 | NVidia GeForce GTX 980 Ti
